p: The objective of this research is to study the chemical variation of the different NS Eos originated from India, Saudi Arabia, Morocco, Syria, and France and to evaluate their potential on some of the most common pathogenic multidrug-resistant bacteria: methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and Acinetobacter baumannii isolated from the hospital.
